opinion.bold: UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDA DECISIONS OF THE SUPREME COURT OF VERMONT
opinion.opinion_text:
Notice to the Bar The Supreme Court of Vermont, commencing with decisions filed in 1991, will compile and publish a table, on a monthly basis, listing the disposition of all appeals on the merits other than those made by published opinion or published memorandum decision.
Copies of these unpublished memoranda decisions have been filed with, and are available from, the Law and Documents Library in Montpelier.
Doc.No. Title Disposition Date Trial Forum A.2d
98-135 Delaney v. State Dismissed 5/4/98 Frank. Sup. 712/394 98-148 Dunn v. City of Denied 5/4/98 712/394 Burlington 97-208 Longariello v.
